channel.title: Small PHP project. WIP
channel.description:
Hello all,
I've been working on my first PHP project so I thought I'd share my progress with you all. I'm working on a basic CMS with page creation, editing, menu maintenance etc.
It's not pretty, it's not finished, but it's mine and I'm proud of it. :palm:
If anyone has any recommendations feel free to suggest ideas.
Done so far:
[ul][li]Page Creation w/editing & deleting[/li] [li]Can Add/Remove created pages from the Main Menu[/li][/ul]
To do:
[ul][li]Add seperate modules on the footer to add stuff to the footer.[/li] [li]Make the AdminCP secure[/li][/ul]
Obviously there are a few methods in place to disable people from deleting certain/essential pages and even editing some fields.
